name: Dyson Airwrap
details:
Dyson Airwrap Complete Long – Prussian Blue

For Hannah’s long, beautiful hair. No heat damage, just effortless curls every morning. 專為Hannah嘅長髮設計！每日醒來都係女神頭，無損傷造型

name: Le Creuset Cast Iron Pot (26cm)
details:
Le Creuset Signature Round Dutch Oven – Cerise Red

Our first pot for family dinners, soups, and Sunday roasts. Will last a lifetime, just like our love. 紅色代表愛情！呢個煲會陪我哋煮第一餐、第一百餐、第一千餐

name: Nespresso Vertuo Next
details:
Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee Machine – Matte Black

For our lazy Sunday mornings in bed with coffee and kisses. 星期日朝早，咖啡香＋你嘅吻＝完美開始

name: SMEG Retro Kettle
details:
SMEG 50's Retro Electric Kettle – Cream

Boiling water for tea, congee, and midnight snacks. Cute and practical, just like us! 又靚又實用，仲有復古feel～每日都想用

name: Red Pocket 利是 (Any amount)
details:
隨心利是 ♡ 任何金額都好感動！

Your love and blessings mean the world to us. Every dollar helps build our future home. 錢多錢少都係心意！每一分都係你哋對我哋嘅愛

name: 愛心利是 隨心祝福
details:
愛心利是 ♡ 祝福我哋新婚快樂！

From $10 to $10,000 — every amount is a hug from you. 十蚊定一萬都一樣暖心！多謝你哋嘅支持
